description: This add-on adds a low german dictionary to Firefox's spell checker. The low german language is also known under the names Plattdüütsch, Plattdeutsch, Niederdeutsch, Niedersächsisch, Sächsisch and according to the ISO 639-2 norm has the language code nds. This add-on uses LibreOffice's hunspell dictionary for low german, which you can find at https://github.com/tdf/dict_nds. Shoutout to its developers: they did a great work with that!
name: Plattdüütsch Wöörbook
